attributes.action: Call for a general election after Liz Truss resignation
attributes.additional_details: It is somewhat disingenuous to expect the country to get behind a leader and party they have not personally elected
attributes.background: Accept that in the national interest a general election is required for members of the public to elect a leader and party to take the country forward with a clear mandate

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/619781
